reviewsArr.name: Matthew
reviewsArr.review: As a football fan for many years, I was very surprised by the quality of the Spanish national team jersey at such a reasonable price ðŸ˜Š

reviewsArr.name: Luke
reviewsArr.review: I decided to buy the Spanish national team jersey for the first time and now I enjoy it every time I support my team, thank you.

reviewsArr.name: Valentina
reviewsArr.review: The quality of the jersey is amazing, and the size is perfect! Thank you, I will recommend it to my friends.

reviewsArr.name: James
reviewsArr.review: Honestly, I love watching football, and the new Spanish national team jersey was exactly what I needed.

reviewsArr.name: Martina
reviewsArr.header: Wow, I absolutely love this product!
reviewsArr.review: At first, I thought the jersey was expensive, but fortunately, I bought it and now I enjoy the best matches with it. Thank you!

faqs.question: How long will I wait for my prize?
Are there any hidden costs?
faqs.answer: Absolutely not. Once you have won your prize and entered your details, we will take care of the rest. Shipping costs are our responsibility!

faqs.question: I'm a winner, why should I answer the questions/guess the box?
faqs.answer: You're not a winner yet, but you were one of the 10 people selected to try to win our prize...

faqs.question: How can I get a prize if I win?
faqs.answer: First, you need to enter your shipping address and contact details, then our system will direct you. Then you have to prove that you are not a robot, as the prize is only offered to real people.

faqs.question: Why should I pay Â£1.95 for a prize?
faqs.answer: Â£1.95 is not a price - it is an upfront payment to prove that you are indeed human. All payments will be refunded once approved.

faqs.question: Can't use my credit card, transaction failed?
faqs.answer: If you can't use your credit card, your bank is blocking the transaction: you need to check your bank account.

arr.q: Have you ever ordered products from McDonald's?
Should McDonald's continue with this type of advertising campaigns?
a: Yes, but change the promotional menu

arr.q: Would you recommend our products to your friends?

check.title: Your answer will be reviewed
arr: Your IP address shows no previous orders

texts.header: Thank you for participating in the survey!
texts.text:
To get the McDonald's menu at a promotional price, you need to choose the correct gift box.

You have 3 attempts, good luck!
<center> Unfortunately, this gift is empty. You have two more attempts, good luck! </center>

Click "Get the coupon", fill out the form, and pay for the order.

Receive a text message with the coupon and instructions on how to activate it.

The coupon can be activated at any time and requires no additional payment.
